Investigators are putting thousands of packages under intense scrutiny across Texas and appealing for help from the public after a string of mysterious bombings in the state.
The latest detonated early Tuesday at a FedEx facility near San Antonio, above, leaving an employee with ringing in the ears.
The authorities believe the sender shipped a second suspicious package, which was turned over to law enforcement.
Both packages were addressed to Austin, where the previous blasts — two of them lethal — occurred.
All five were improvised devices hidden in packages.
Here’s a breakdown of each case.
